tool_description: An all-in-one SoundCloud scraper/downloader. Scrapes albums, playlists, profiles. Downloads uncut high-quality audios and lyrics.
title: SoundCloud Scraper

api_list.name: Download Lyrics on Spotify (2 Quotas)
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a solution to download a track's lyrics on Spotify. (Powered by [Spotify Scraper](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/spotify-scraper/))

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: File format. Defaults to `lrc`.

optional_parameters.name: candidate
optional_parameters.description: The number of the most related Spotify tracks among which a track with the nearest duration will be selected to download its lyrics. Defaults to `3`.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Delay time in milliseconds. Defaults to `0`. Negative value is allowed.

api_list.name: Download Lyrics on Spotify (2 Quotas)
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a solution to download a track's lyrics on Spotify. (Powered by [Spotify Scraper](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/spotify-scraper/))

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: File format. Defaults to `lrc`.

optional_parameters.name: candidate
optional_parameters.description: The number of the most related Spotify tracks among which a track with the nearest duration will be selected to download its lyrics. Defaults to `3`.

optional_parameters.name: delay
optional_parameters.description: Delay time in milliseconds. Defaults to `0`. Negative value is allowed.

api_list.name: Get Track Metadata (1-3 Quotas)
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches full details of a track on SoundCloud and helps you download uncut tracks of high and standard quality. (Tutorial: [How to Use Audio URLs](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-audio-urls))

optional_parameters.name: download
optional_parameters.description:
Download quality. Defaults to `sq`.
* **`hq`**: High and standard quality - 3 quotas
* **`sq`**: Standard quality - 2 quotas
* **`none`**: No download - 1 quota

The final price depends on the existence of the file of the corresponding quality. For example, if `hq` is requested but the high-quality file does not exist, then the price will be 2 quotas if the standard one exists or 1 quota if there is no file available.

api_list.name: Search for Albums
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for SoundCloud albums with optional filters. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
(**README**: [How to Use Endpoints with `offset`](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-endpoints-with-%60offset%60))
The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: genreOrTag
optional_parameters.description: Filters by genre or tag (e.g., `classical`).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned. Defaults to `50`.

api_list.name: Search for Users
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for SoundCloud users with optional filters. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
(**README**: [How to Use Endpoints with `offset`](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-endpoints-with-%60offset%60))
The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned. Defaults to `50`.

optional_parameters.name: place
optional_parameters.description: Filters by a user's location (e.g., `London`).

api_list.name: List User Followers
api_list.description: This endpoint lists a user's followers.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned. Defaults to `50`.

optional_parameters.name: offsetToken
optional_parameters.description:
(**README**: [How to Use Endpoints with `offsetToken`](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-endpoints-with-%60offsettoken%60))
A string for getting the next page of data. If not specified, the first page of data will be returned. If specified, `user` will be ignored.

optional_parameters.name: user
optional_parameters.description: User URL or ID.

optional_parameters.description: Whether to remove replies. Defaults to `false`.

optional_parameters.description:
(**README**: [How to Use Endpoints with `offset`](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-endpoints-with-%60offset%60))

api_list.name: Search for (Go+) Tracks
api_list.description: This endpoint searches for SoundCloud (Go+) tracks with optional filters. Pagination scraping is supported.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
(**README**: [How to Use Endpoints with `offset`](https://rapidapi.com/DataFanatic/api/soundcloud-scraper/tutorials/how-to-use-endpoints-with-%60offset%60))
The number of items omitted before the results. Defaults to `0`.

optional_parameters.name: license
optional_parameters.description:
Filters by how a track can be used. Defaults to `listen`.
* **`listen`**: To listen to
* **`share`**: To share
* **`use`**: To use commercially
* **`modify`**: To modify commercially

optional_parameters.name: goPlus
optional_parameters.description: Searches for Go+ tracks only. Defaults to `false`.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The max number of items returned. Defaults to `50`.

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description:
Filters by a track's duration. Defaults to `any`.
* **`any`**: Any duration
* **`short`**: < 2 min
* **`medium`**: 2-10 min
* **`long`**: 10-30 min
* **`epic`**: > 30 min

optional_parameters.name: addedIn
optional_parameters.description:
Filters by when a track was added. Defaults to `any`.
* **`any`**: Added at any time
* **`hour`**: Added in the past hour
* **`day`**: Added in the past day
* **`week`**: Added in the past week
* **`month`**: Added in the past month
* **`year`**: Added in the past year

optional_parameters.name: genreOrTag
optional_parameters.description: Filters by genre or tag (e.g., `classical`).

api_list.name: Get Home Page Overview
api_list.description: This endpoint fetches trending information displayed on the SoundCloud home page as an incognito visitor.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soundcloud-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/v1/home/details"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soundcloud-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
